body:
This is documented:

https://golang.org/pkg/crypto/rsa/#SignPKCS1v15 says:
"If hash is zero, hashed is signed directly. This isn't advisable except for interoperability."

https://golang.org/pkg/crypto/rsa/#VerifyPKCS1v15 says:
"If hash is zero then hashed is used directly."

This appears to be working as documented.
